name: azure-devops-mcp
description: MCP server for interacting with Azure DevOps - manage work items, repositories, pipelines, wikis, and more
long_description: The Azure DevOps MCP Server brings Azure DevOps context directly to Claude. Access projects, work items, repositories, pull requests, pipelines, test plans, wikis, and advanced security features. Perfect for developers and teams using Azure DevOps who want to streamline their workflow with AI assistance.

organization.title: Azure DevOps Organization
organization.description: Your Azure DevOps organization name (e.g., if your URL is https://dev.azure.com/contoso, enter 'contoso')

pat.title: Personal Access Token
pat.description: Your Azure DevOps Personal Access Token. This is required to authenticate API calls without opening a browser. Create one at: https://dev.azure.com/{your-org}/_usersSettings/tokens
